A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is beautifully done. It's filled with interesting and necessary surprises that help push the new main characters of the saga to where they need to be. It will win over a new generation of fans. As a long time fan of the original trilogy\, I enjoyed the ride. Kylo Ren and Rey are the most interesting new characters thus far. Their dynamic and connection stole the show. I hope we see more of it.
